title: Can I give exams for the 11th and 12th directly without going to school? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, you can give your exams. There are so many students who don’t go to school and choose to study in open schools. You can also take admission in open schools. You are eligible for class 12 exams after you get admission in open school. They provide you study material and register you for class 10 or 12 exams. You can apply for higher studies after qualifying exams. Some students study in open school so that they could study for competition exams.  Here I am sharing you a list of open schools. Let’s have a look. 1. Indian Board of School Education 2. Indian Board of Computer Education 3. J&K State Board of School Education 4. Jharkhand Academic Council 5. yes u can give the exams by not going in the school regular as there are many school which give you the dummy kind of a admission in which u go to  school only for giving the practical exams , FA exam , half yearly exam means there is no need to go regular in the class it give benefit u as u can prepare well for your entrance exam and focus only on the workload of the institution not of the school thank u ignore grammatical mistake .

NIOS —The National Institute of Open Schooling This is an open school which allows education for 10th and 12th and other vocational and diploma courses. Once you fill all the forms and pay the fees, they will send you the courses materials through post. There is a facility of on—demand examinations also which one can apply for if he/she is qualified enough for that. The facility of classes is also there, where the student can go and collect the notes. The open school is an initiative made by the government of India and is affilated by the same. Hope this helped. Happy learning :)

Yes, you can give your exams. There are so many students who don’t go to school. You can also take admission in some schools which allows you to give exam for the 11th and 12th directly. They provide you study material and register you for class 10 or 12 exams. You can apply for higher studies after qualifying exams. Some students study in such school so that they could study for competition exams. 9403038911 is of the school number which allows. i hope my answer will help you.

Yes. You can take dummy admissions in the schools that allow this. I myself am a dummy student currently studying in class 12th. Donot worry at all. It's all possible. Just do a lil bit research on the schools in ur town. Which so ever school gives dummy ask them all the questions that u have regarding practicals etc. That's it…Good luck..

May be yes,but some times means once when there is an urgent work in schools like exam forms,practical exams etc then you are supposed to go to the school but overall there is no need to go to school. I also didn't go to the school when I was in 11th or 12th clasa.As I explained above sometimes I used to go to the school .
Integrated courses are available…but the govt. can put a ban on it anytime. Most people who opt for this are the ones who wish to concentrate on the prep for their entrance exams Happy learning
there are set rules for appearing as external student for different boards. you need to log in to website and going to f a q’s find out the rules for appearing for exams
